import axios from'axios';var url='https://bookaxcess-app.herokuapp.com/posts';export var fetchPosts=function fetchPosts(){return axios.get(url);};export var createPost=function createPost(newPost){return axios.post(url,newPost);};// export const likePost = (id) => axios.patch(`${url}/${id}/likePost`);
export var updatePost=function updatePost(id,updatedPost){return axios.patch("".concat(url,"/").concat(id),updatedPost);};export var deletePost=function deletePost(id){return axios.delete("".concat(url,"/").concat(id));};export var likePost=function likePost(id){return axios.patch("".concat(url,"/").concat(id,"/likePost"));};
